biotools.summary: It is for the annotation of protein sequences relying on a comparative large-scale analysis on the entire UniProt. With BAR 3.0 and a sequence you can annotate when possible: function, structure, protein domains. Also if your sequence falls into a cluster with a structural/some structural template/s we provide an alignment towards the template/templates based on the Cluster-HMM that allows you to directly compute your 3D model. Cluster HMMs are available for downloading.

bioschemas.name: BAR
